description.de:
Von dem Ersteller von be***l***iebten Ser***i***en wie ***T***wo Pi***e***ce, Da***r***uto und Detergent kommt die Serie Test, eine preisgekrönte rom***a***ntische Komödie über einen Highschoo***l***-Waffenmeister namens Yugi, der die ganze We***l***t bereist und alle Life Notes sammelt, damit er eines Tages die Leiche seines Bruders bergen kann, nachdem er das Taboo erfüllt hat, den Titan, den wir an dem Tag mit seinem Stand gesehen haben, zu one-punchen und zum Nokage-Piratenkönig zu werden -datteba***y***o. Schauen Sie zu, wie er mit seinem Onii-Chan und generischen ***H***arem Mädchen durch das He***i***lige Reich von Bri***t***annia streift, während sie alle Widrigkeiten mit der Kraft der Freundschaft, ***L***iebe und... (warum knall***e***n sie sich nicht einfach gegenseitig.) In diesem Epos in Spielfilmlänge, was das von Gilgamesch und der Ilias konku***r***riert, werden wir die Mentalität und Soziologie dieser gesellschaftlichen Bedrohungen erforschen, während sie die Erde in ihrem nie stillbaren Durst nach Imoutos verwüsten.

Rezensenten geben dieser Serie eine 10/10 für die unkonventionelle Darstellung des Magical Girl Genre.
Nominiert für die 1. MangaDex Auszeichnungen für den schlechtesten Manga des Jahres.
Gewinner der 2. MangaDex Auszeichnungen für den besten Manga des Jahres.
Der beste Manga aller Zeiten, wie Meichiro Noda feststellte.

---

**Hinweis:** Bitte fügen Sie *KEINE* Genre hinzu, oder der Test Manga wird die Suche verschmutzen. Weil dieser Manga die reinste Form aller Manga ist [Der Plural von Manga ist Manga].

**Fun fact:** Im Jahr 127, als dieser Manga ursprünglich veröffentlicht wurde, hieß er "Taest", aber wurde wegen den amerikanischen Druckkosten pro Buchstabe zu "Test" verkürzt.

---

Das war nervig zu übersetzten - [Tristan](https://mangadex.org/user/01642be8-72b8-48ae-9199-d8c747946ca5) 2022
description.en:
From the creator of popu***l***ar ser***i***es like ***T***wo Pi***e***ce, Da***r***uto, ***a***nd Detergent, comes the series Test, an award winning romantic comedy about a high schoo***l*** weapon meister named Yugi as he trave***l***s the entire world collecting all the Life Notes, so that one da***y*** ***h***e can recover h***i***s bro***t***her's body after performing the taboo of one punching the Titan we saw that day with his Stand and becoming the Nokage Pirate King -dattebayo. Watch as he roams through the Ho***l***y ***E***mpi***r***e of Britannia with his Onii-chan and generic harem girls as they conquer all odds with the power of friendship, love and…(why don't they just bang each other.) In this feature length epic rivaling that of Gilgamesh and the Iliad we will explore the mentality and sociology of these societal menaces as they ravage the Earth in their never quenchable thirst for imoutos.  

Reviewers gives this series a 10/10 for the unconventional portrayal of the magical girl genre.  
Nominated for the 1st Mangadex Award for Worst Manga of the Year.  
Winner of the 2nd Mangadex Awards for Best Manga of the Year.  
Best manga ever written, as stated by meichiro noda  

---
**Note:** Please do *NOT* add genres or Test will pollute genre searches. Because this manga is the most purest form of any manga [The plural of manga is manga]  
  
**Fun fact:** In the year 127, when this manga was originally released, it used to be called Taest, but because of American per/letter printing costs it was shortened to Test.  

---

“Umm… so, personally… this is the first time this has happened, so I'm a bit surprised. Only a centimeter away… I mean, I don't think there's ever been someone who's gotten that close to me… without a, you know… calamity occurring. I'm not really… not really sure what happens at one centimeter away… 'cause it's my first time. I don't really understand it either. Seriously. But in the flow of calamity… there's nobody who can attack me. Not a single person. That, I know for sure. Wonder of U.” - Unknown   
  
"Thanos kills Dumbledore" - Anonymous Reviewer  
  
"Like zoinks, man it's Mr Bombastic." - Shaggy  
  
"DEUS VULT!!" - Knight Templars  
  
"There are zombies on my Lawn" - Crazy Astel  
  
"I FINALLY HAVE A F*CKING NOSE" - Lord Coco  
  
"NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" - Darth Vader  
  
"The turtles! *They're everywhere!*" - #8699  
  
"Who's Rem?" - Subaru Impreza  
  
"I approb" - Oozora Subaru  
  
 "PURGE THE HERETICS" - The Space Marines  
  
![WHOAAAAAA](<https://i.ibb.co/dM9yv89/WHOAAAAAA.gif>)  
  
![EHE](<https://media1.tenor.com/images/fdcd995c9db4af798c2daa4380c79a8c/tenor.gif>)  
  
![HEH](<https://cdn.discordapp.com/emojis/650248281091342346.png>)
  
I have so many questions.

Test2

---
- [YumGumYum](https://mangadex.org/user/3678de43-a55d-43be-b2ab-5c32a8219021/yumgumyum) **:**

      remind me to write something here

- [Tristan](https://mangadex.org/user/01642be8-72b8-48ae-9199-d8c747946ca5) **:**

      @YumGumYum reminder

description.de:
Von dem Ersteller von be***l***iebten Ser***i***en wie ***T***wo Pi***e***ce, Da***r***uto und Detergent kommt die Serie Test, eine preisgekrönte rom***a***ntische Komödie über einen Highschoo***l***-Waffenmeister namens Yugi, der die ganze We***l***t bereist und alle Life Notes sammelt, damit er eines Tages die Leiche seines Bruders bergen kann, nachdem er das Taboo erfüllt hat, den Titan, den wir an dem Tag mit seinem Stand gesehen haben, zu one-punchen und zum Nokage-Piratenkönig zu werden -datteba***y***o. Schauen Sie zu, wie er mit seinem Onii-Chan und generischen ***H***arem Mädchen durch das He***i***lige Reich von Bri***t***annia streift, während sie alle Widrigkeiten mit der Kraft der Freundschaft, ***L***iebe und... (warum knall***e***n sie sich nicht einfach gegenseitig.) In diesem Epos in Spielfilmlänge, was das von Gilgamesch und der Ilias konku***r***riert, werden wir die Mentalität und Soziologie dieser gesellschaftlichen Bedrohungen erforschen, während sie die Erde in ihrem nie stillbaren Durst nach Imoutos verwüsten.

Rezensenten geben dieser Serie eine 10/10 für die unkonventionelle Darstellung des Magical Girl Genre.
Nominiert für die 1. MangaDex Auszeichnungen für den schlechtesten Manga des Jahres.
Gewinner der 2. MangaDex Auszeichnungen für den besten Manga des Jahres.
Der beste Manga aller Zeiten, wie Meichiro Noda feststellte.

---

**Hinweis:** Bitte fügen Sie *KEINE* Genre hinzu, oder der Test Manga wird die Suche verschmutzen. Weil dieser Manga die reinste Form aller Manga ist [Der Plural von Manga ist Manga].

**Fun fact:** Im Jahr 127, als dieser Manga ursprünglich veröffentlicht wurde, hieß er "Taest", aber wurde wegen den amerikanischen Druckkosten pro Buchstabe zu "Test" verkürzt.

---

Das war nervig zu übersetzten - [Tristan](https://mangadex.org/user/01642be8-72b8-48ae-9199-d8c747946ca5) 2022
description.en:
From the creator of popu***l***ar ser***i***es like ***T***wo Pi***e***ce, Da***r***uto, ***a***nd Detergent, comes the series Test, an award winning romantic comedy about a high schoo***l*** weapon meister named Yugi as he trave***l***s the entire world collecting all the Life Notes, so that one da***y*** ***h***e can recover h***i***s bro***t***her's body after performing the taboo of one punching the Titan we saw that day with his Stand and becoming the Nokage Pirate King -dattebayo. Watch as he roams through the Ho***l***y ***E***mpi***r***e of Britannia with his Onii-chan and generic harem girls as they conquer all odds with the power of friendship, love and…(why don't they just bang each other.) In this feature length epic rivaling that of Gilgamesh and the Iliad we will explore the mentality and sociology of these societal menaces as they ravage the Earth in their never quenchable thirst for imoutos.  

Reviewers gives this series a 10/10 for the unconventional portrayal of the magical girl genre.  
Nominated for the 1st Mangadex Award for Worst Manga of the Year.  
Winner of the 2nd Mangadex Awards for Best Manga of the Year.  
Best manga ever written, as stated by meichiro noda  

---
**Note:** Please do *NOT* add genres or Test will pollute genre searches. Because this manga is the most purest form of any manga [The plural of manga is manga]  
  
**Fun fact:** In the year 127, when this manga was originally released, it used to be called Taest, but because of American per/letter printing costs it was shortened to Test.  

---

“Umm… so, personally… this is the first time this has happened, so I'm a bit surprised. Only a centimeter away… I mean, I don't think there's ever been someone who's gotten that close to me… without a, you know… calamity occurring. I'm not really… not really sure what happens at one centimeter away… 'cause it's my first time. I don't really understand it either. Seriously. But in the flow of calamity… there's nobody who can attack me. Not a single person. That, I know for sure. Wonder of U.” - Unknown

A food-loving tattooist, YooJung. After losing consciousness due to a sudden accident she opens her eyes to find herself possessing ‘Sylvia’, a character from the novel she read. In addition, she happens to meet ‘Felix’, the hero of the novel, who, due to the abuse of his stepmother, suffers from anorexia and will soon turn the continent into blood. In order to eat more delicious food, to cook more easily, Sylvia inscribes magic circles on to her body. The new magic circles that are born through her fingertips bring a new breeze to the continent where magic-beasts are rampant.

Yuan Chu transmigrated as the opposing boss in the novel, but she was wiped out by the male lead Ye Chen Yuan. Fortunately, she reincarnates once more, but back to the past, when Yuan was still young! Looking at the pitifully weak Little Yuan, she is troubled by a dilemma. Should she: 1. kill him, or 2. raise him up and openly ask for treasures from him. However, since she wants to get all sorts of treasures from him, she chooses the second option. Things don't always work out though, as she accidentally raises a sheep up to be a big bad wolf.   
  
Master? Want treasure? Let's cultivate together, but alone, just us two, then.

title.en: Guide to a Male God Chasing His Wife

altTitles.en: Nan Shen Zhui Qi Zhi Nan

description.en:
The Modern-day Chapter of "The Distinguished Cute Master (Meng Shi Zai Shang)"! The miserable little white lotus was rescued by the male god. The male god cares for the little white lotus and raises her into a black hearted lotus who'll beat down any enemies!   
Lotus: "You're planning on doing something to me, aren't you? Are you looking at my body?!" (Huggingblankettightly.jpg)  
Male God: "Fool, I have been searching for you for a long time. Now, I just want to spoil you."

Veyron City—a mega-floating metropolis created from the discovery of new energy sources.

Shuu, a young man who owns and operates a small business in the area, leads a meager life due to his reckless spending. Kisara, a girl who visits Shuu's office and home because she is constantly concerned about him. She works while attending high school in Veyron City, doing everything from clerical work to housework. Ayano, Shuu's ex-girlfriend and a senior colleague at the corporation he had previously worked for, is also worried about him.

Thus begins the slapstick romantic comedy of three people in a slightly unusual relationship that takes place on an artificial island in the Pacific Ocean.
description.ja:
「悪魔」が引き起こす特殊な事件「Ｄ災害」が多発しているメガフロート都市…ベイロンシティ。
この場所で、悪魔退治の仕事をする青年・緒方シュウは、日頃の金遣いの荒さからひもじい生活を送っていた。
そんな彼を心配し、世話を焼くのは美少女高校生・キサラ。
しかし、彼女の正体は、じつはキスを代償として彼と契約した「悪魔」で…!?
シュウの元カノと、二人の危うい絆が織りなす予測不能のラブコメディー！

description.en: A boy abandoned at birth and raised by rats, with the mysterious power to control rats, grows up seeing the dark side of the humans that rejected him, and vows to become humanity's greatest enemy.
